official_title: A joint resolution designating May 1 through May 7, 1981 as "Days of Remembrance of Victims of the Holocaust".

summary.text: Requests the President to designate the week of May 1 through May 7, 1981, as "Days of Remembrance of Victims of the Holocaust."
